intro: Every hunt, every build, and every step matters in the frozen wild.
description:
After a brutal wolf attack, the protagonist regains consciousness alone in a snow-covered mountain and forest wilderness. There is nothing around him but cold wind, deep snow, and signs of wild animals. Injured, exhausted, and almost without equipment, he must face a world where winter itself is the main enemy.
To survive, he must hunt, search for food, gather resources, and find shelter. Without fire, there is no warmth. Without proper clothing, the night cannot be endured. Every step through the snow drains precious strength.
At the same time, the search for a missing friend drives the story forward. While exploring the mountainous and forest landscape, players discover scattered notes that reveal clues and unlock new crafting recipes. These discoveries gradually expand survival possibilities and move the narrative ahead.
It is a journey through cold, isolation, and constant decision-making.

Key Features:
	•	Harsh Winter Survival — cold, hunger, and exhaustion directly affect the character’s condition.
	•	Hunting and Food Gathering — track and hunt animals to survive.
	•	Crafting System — create tools, weapons, clothing, campfires, and drying racks.
	•	Recipe Unlocking Through Notes — discover new crafting options by finding scattered notes.
	•	Story-Driven Progression — advance the narrative while surviving in the wilderness.
	•	Snowy Mountain and Forest World — inhabited by wolves, bears, rabbits, deer, and boars.
	•	Dynamic Weather — changing conditions enhance atmosphere and survival challenge.


Frost Survival – Winter is a steady struggle for survival in a cold and unforgiving environment. Every resource matters, every discovery strengthens you, and every step through the snow brings you closer to endurance — or failure.
